item.title: One Direction - Steal My Girl - Key of C
item.description: Play along video for the song Steal My Girl performed by One Direction. Chords used in the song: C, F, G.

item.title: One Direction - What Makes You Beautiful - Key of F
item.description: Play along video for the song What Makes You Beautiful performed by One Direction. Chords used in the song: B♭, C, Dm, F.

item.title: One Direction - Story of My Life - Key of D
item.description: Play along video for the song Story of My Life performed by One Direction. Chords used in the song: A, Bm7, D, Em, G.
